meanings.definition: A person who follows a routine or set of established procedures.
meanings.sent1: The routinists at the office always start their day with a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent2: The group of routinists goes for a walk in the park every evening.
meanings.sent3: The routinists decided to switch things up and have lunch at a new restaurant.
meanings.sent4: In a world of chaos, the routinists are the steady anchors keeping everything in order.
meanings.sent5: The image of the routinists walking in a straight line is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: Those who adhere strictly to a particular routine or set of habits.
meanings.sent1: The routinists in the neighborhood always water their plants at the same time every day.
meanings.sent2: She is one of the routinists who never miss their morning jog.
meanings.sent3: The routinists had a competition to see who could stick to their routine the longest.
meanings.sent4: The routinists were like robots, following their set patterns without deviation.
meanings.sent5: The routinists' dedication to their habits is truly admirable.
